```{r, echo=FALSE}
bootstrap_card <- function(title, image, caption, link, link_text, alt_text = "") {
  paste(
    '<div class="col-sm-3">',
    '<div class="card" style="width: 18rem;">',
    paste0('<a href="', link, '"><img class="card-img-top" src="', image, '" alt="', alt_text, '"></a>'),
    '<div class="card-body">',
    paste0('<h5 class="card-title">', title, '</h5>'),
    paste0('<p class="card-text">', caption, '</p>'),
    paste0('<a href="', link, '" class="btn btn-primary">', link_text, '</a>'),
    '</div>',
    '</div>',
    '</div>',
    sep = "\n"
  )
}
```
